title: Searching for Ping
body: Does anyone here knows the ping for Turkey and Korean servers? If do please kindly comment below. Thank you,

replies.body: Depend on which servers you play currently and how much ping you have there, why not just create one account for korea and one for turkey so you  can test it out?
Actually I did and the ping went way up to 300 so i went afk the first game lol

you can try to ping the server? 

Open a command prompt and type 
ping -t ip of server
so for EUW it's ping -t 104.160.141.3
NA - 104.160.131.3
EUW - 104.160.141.3
EUNE - 104.160.142.3
OCE - 104.160.156.1
LAN - 104.160.136.3

don't know the ip's for korea or turkey tho
Yeah I've been all over the posts and internet looking for those two but couldn't really find it. Anyways thanks for the help.

Sadly I don't have those IP's on hand. You could try reaching out to their player support specifically, or better yet I have a much quicker way to find out. With league being a F2P game, go ahead and create a new account on the Turkey server and hop into a practice/custom game. That'd be the quickest and easiest method to test your ping on those servers in an actual game ^_^!
Thanks for the help! I will do!
